'''2.3.200''' is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|launcher]] released on May 24, 2022.

== Changes ==
* Lots of under the hood stability improvements.

== Fixes ==
* More work on fixing user entitlement & offline mode/time-out issues.
* Fixes to variety of other bugs, access problems, user & data issues.
* {{Bug|MCL-21249}} - Loading icon dark background is restrained to the size of the loading icon, rather than covering the entire window.
* {{Bug|MCL-21215}} - What's New page is blank when opening without an Internet connection.</onlyinclude>
* {{Bug|MCL-21454}} - Launching 22w19a and above gives the error message: "Failed to download file. Java runtime manifest is missing the desired component for this platform"
